User Guide
==========

These pages serve as a user and administration guide. We highly recommend that you start with the :doc:`writing` and :doc:`query/index` sections to understand how OpenTSDB handles its core purpose of storing and serving time series information. Then follow up with the :doc:`quickstart` section to play around with getting some data into your OpenTSDB instance. Finally follow up with the other pages for details on the other features of OpenTSDB.
